Locations

Where We Build.

Lusaka, Zambia

Main Hub

Our primary physical sessions are held in Lusaka. This is where we gather for the intense "Identity Excavation" and "Dialogue Mastery" workshops.

Virtual / Hybrid

Global Reach

We use a hybrid model to connect you with international mentors and peers across the continent. Key sessions and check-ins happen virtually to accommodate your schedule.
